IX.iii.2.A.4.i
.
Obtaining Medicaid Status Information on Incompetent Veterans
The fiduciary activity may be able to provide information on the Medicaid status of incompetent beneficiaries for whom they provide fiduciary oversight.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A - Pension Reductions for Medicaid-Covered Nursing Facility Care
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 2, Section A
